remarks: Lemma for ~ fta :  Discharge the auxiliary variables in ~ ftalem5 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Sep-2014.)
statement:
ftalem.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
ftalem.2 $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
ftalem.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
ftalem.4 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
ftalem6.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` 0 ) =/= 0 ) $.
ftalem6 $p |- ( ph -> E. x e. CC ( abs ` ( F ` x ) ) < ( abs ` ( F ` 0 ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d N x $.
$d ph x $.
